title: Ground News - Biographer: Pope Benedict Was ‘Bitterly Disappointed’ by Pope Francis
text:
Summary by Breitbart Peter Seewald, close friend and collaborator of Pope Benedict XVI , said Thursday that Benedict was “stabbed in the heart” by Pope Francis’ attacks on the traditional Latin Mass. Share menu More
